languages.text: {n}К счастью, убежищ культа в ульях было куда меньше, чем могло бы быть. Потери были невелики... в масштабах планеты.{/n}
{n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}К счастью, убежищ культа в ульях было куда меньше, чем могло бы быть. Потери были невелики... в масштабах планеты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult shelters in the hives than expected. The losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}
{n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult shelters in the hives than expected. The losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}
{n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

{n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}值得庆幸的是，巢都中的邪教藏身处比预期的要少得多，因此整体损失也相对较小……至少在行星尺度上是这样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}值得庆幸的是，巢都中的邪教藏身处比预期的要少得多，因此整体损失也相对较小……至少在行星尺度上是这样。{/n}
{n}值得庆幸的是，巢都中的邪教庇护所比预期的要少得多，因此整体损失也相对较小……至少在行星尺度上是这样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Afortunadamente, había muchos menos refugios del culto de los esperados en las colmenas. Las pérdidas fueron relativamente pequeñas... a escala planetaria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Afortunadamente, había muchos menos refugios del culto de los esperados en las colmenas. Las pérdidas fueron relativamente pequeñas... a escala planetaria.{/n}

languages.text: {n}運よく、ハイヴにカルトのシェルターは予想よりずっと少なかった。惑星規模では...損失は比較的少なく済んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}運よく、ハイヴの魔女団シェルターは予想よりずっと少なかった。惑星規模では...損失は比較的少なく済んだ。{/n}
{n}運よく、ハイヴの魔女団シェルターは予想よりずっと少なかった。惑星規模では...損失は比較的少なく済んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fort heureusement, il y a moins de repaires du culte que prévu au sein des ruches et les pertes sont relativement limitées... à l'échelle de la planète, du moins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fort heureusement, il y a moins de repaires du culte que prévu au sein des ruches et les pertes sont relativement limitées... à l'échelle de la planète, du moins.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glücklicherweise gab es in den Makropolen weniger Verstecke des Kultes als befürchtet. Die Verluste waren relativ gering ... für planetare Verhältnisse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thankfully, there were much fewer cult hideouts in the hives than expected. Losses were relatively small... on a planetary scale.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glücklicherweise gab es in den Makropolen weniger Verstecke des Kultes als befürchtet. Die Verluste waren relativ gering ... für planetare Verhältnisse.{/n}
{n}Glücklicherweise gab es in den Makropolen weniger Zufluchtsstätten des Kults als gefürchtet. Die Verluste waren relativ gering ... auf planetarer Ebene betrachtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şükürler olsun ki kovanda beklenenden çok daha az tarikat sığınağı mevcuttu. Zayiat, gezegen ölçeğinde bakılırsa nispeten az oldu.{/n}
